name: Aster
description: Aster is a community-driven meme token built on the Binance Smart Chain. Inspired by the imagery of being “the loudest light in a quiet sky, the brightest in a dark sky,” Aster represents both fun and strength in the decentralized space. Beyond its meme roots, the project aims to build an engaged global community, leveraging strong branding, utility expansion, and listings across major Web3 wallets and exchanges.
